text: William Hussey is an English author who lives in Skegness, Lincolnshire. As a child William loved horror comics, which inspired his writings today. His father owns a ghost train. ==Publications== Hussey has written many horror stories for both adults and older children, most notably his Witchfinder trilogy. * Witchfinder: Dawn of the Demontide (4 March 2010, Oxford University Press ) * Witchfinder: Gallows at Twilight * Witchfinder: The Last Nightfall * Jekyll's Mirror * Haunted * The Nightmare Eater ==References== ==External links== *Witchfinder books website Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:British writers
title: William Hussey (writer)
